alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 11:21AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL OKALOOSA AND SOUTHEASTERN SANTA ROSA COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 AM CDT... At 1020 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of Roeville, or 7 miles east of Bagdad, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milton, Bagdad, Point Baker, Pea Ridge, and Roeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
